definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: tingle, quiver (NH [[חִלְחֵל]] whirr (rare); Ar. s.al; Targum [[חְלַל]]; Syr. s.aros.ara);—Pf. 3 pl. [[חָֽלְלוּ]] Hb Hab 3:16; Impf. 3 fpl. [[תְּחִלֶּינׇה]] 1Sa 3:11, [[תִּצַּלְנׇה]] (Ges:§ 67 g) 2Ki 21:12, Je 19:3; —tingle, of ears, at horrid sound 1Sa 3:11, 2Ki 21:12, Je 19:3 (all of dreadful news); of lips, quiver in terror Hb Hab 3:16.
